name: India Tourism eCatalog
tag_list: incredible-india, india-travel, india-tourism, tourism-india, travel-to-india, india-travel-information, information-on-tourism-india, india-travel-packages, india-holidays, destinations-india, india-hotels, india-tour-operators, indian-palaces
overview:
India Tourism eCatalog aims to provide authentic information compiled from all State Government run tourism boards. This information contains maps, eguides, destination planners, tourism circuits..

Special focus is on responsible travel, rural tourism, Eco tourism and Volunteer/spiritual tourism.

India is a land of diversities and mix of blending cultures, religions and ethnicity. Every 50 miles is a changing spectrum of varying landscapes, people, culture and ethnic diversity.

India Tourism eCatalog also offers complete interface between state run tourism boards and foreign tour agents. All information provided is free of cost.

India Tourism eCatlaog also recommends select hotels, tour operators, palaces, ayurveda spas, and unique/unheard of destinations.
